enum  rpmgiFlags_e {
  RPMGI_NONE = 0, RPMGI_TSADD = (1 << 0), RPMGI_TSORDER = (1 << 1), RPMGI_NOGLOB = (1 << 2),
  RPMGI_NOMANIFEST = (1 << 3), RPMGI_NOHEADER = (1 << 4)
}
